price: 25. Le Message aurait-il été confié à lui seul d’entre nous tous ? Que non, c’est un fieffé menteur ! »
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhābun ashirun
